name: TxNumNexusVerification
description: Verifies if a user has created more than `minTxThreshold` transactions on a given network

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The account address on the Nexus network for which the transaction count is to be verified.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The network identifier. For this verification, it should be set to 'nexus'.

parameters.name: minTxThreshold
parameters.description: The minimum number of transactions required for the account to pass verification.
